annotations.description: Provide additional annotations which may be required.
annotations.title: annotations

className.description: Set the ingressClass that is used for this ingress.
className.title: className

defaultBackend.description: Configure the defaultBackend for this ingress. This will disable any other rules for the ingress.
defaultBackend.title: defaultBackend

host.description: Host address. Helm template can be passed.
host.title: host

path.description: Path.  Helm template can be passed.
path.title: path

name.description:
Overrides the service name reference for this path
This can be an actual service name, or reference a service identifier
from this values.yaml
name.title: name

port.description: Overrides the service port number reference for this path
port.title: port

paths.description: ## Configure the paths for the host
paths.title: paths

hosts.description: ## Configure the hosts for the ingress
hosts.title: hosts

labels.description: Provide additional labels which may be required.
labels.title: labels

nameOverride.description: Override the name suffix that is used for this ingress.
nameOverride.title: nameOverride

primary.description:
Make this the primary ingress (used in probes, notes, etc...).
If there is more than 1 ingress, make sure that only 1 ingress is marked as primary.
primary.title: primary

tls.description: Configure TLS for the ingress. Both secretName and hosts can process a Helm template.
tls.title: tls

bjw-s.common.class.ingress.title: ingress
